name: Plesiosaurus
actions_desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.
special_abilities_desc: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
description:
Plesiosauruses had compact bodies and strong flippers that were used to swim. They had long and flexible necks that accounted for about a third of their length.[1] Plesiosauruses were aggressive predators. They attacked any creature that crossed their path.[1] They were also highly curious and considered to be one of the smartest species of dinosaurs.[2] Plesiosaurs were commonly found in the depths of the Lake of Mists[6] and some dwelled in the Methmere.[7] Beyond the Prime Material plane, some lived within the central lake of the Forbidden Plateau.[8] Sauropods: Anchisaurus • Brachiosaurus • Brontosaurus • Camarasaurus • Cetiosaurus • Diplodocus • Mamenchisaurus • Massospondylus • Plateosaurus
Ornithopods: • Ankylosaurus • Camptosaurus • Dacentrurus • Hadrosaurus • Iguanodon • Kentrosaurus • Lambeosaurus • Monoclonius • Paleocinthus • Pentaceratops • Stegosaurus • Styracosaurus • Trachodon • Triceratops
Pterosaurids: Pteranodon • Pterosaurus • Quetzalcoatlus
Aquatic: Elasmosaurus • Mosasaurus • Nothosaurus • Plesiosaurus • Temnodontosaurus
